name: My Research Library
description: A personal research library powered by Scholion
_source_note: Configure one of the source types below to drive inventory.json generation.

zotero_api._note: Reads from Zotero web API. No desktop app required. Set ZOTERO_API_KEY as a repo secret (Settings → Secrets → Actions). Run the First-time setup workflow to configure library_id and other settings.

bibtex._note: Converts a BibTeX export to inventory.json. Run: python scripts/00_import_bibtex.py (planned)

csv._note: Converts a CSV export to inventory.json. Required columns: key, title, author, year.
